title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 ยง 603.3 - Program or activity redistribution
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 ยง 603.3 - Program or activity redistribution

State Regulations

If the reimbursement claiming requirements for a
particular program or activity allow reimbursement of a specified
classification at a special reimbursement rate, any reflection of the special
rate shown upon the schedule or format for the particular program or activity
must not be also reflected in a separate adjustment schedule or format except
as specifically instructed by the department. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18
ยง
603.3

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
